text: Don't think so. The $500 is in respect to previous month average balance. So it $500 more against 100k

u qualify for the interest but the interest not deposited on day 1. so if u just top up 118  ur overall balance will be 500 more than previous month  but your average balance will not be. OCBC count by average daily balance by end of month must be $500 more
if say the 382 deposited on 10th of the month (roughly 1/3 through the month)  u top up 118 on 1st of the month  ur average balance increase for the month will be 382*2/3 + 118 = ~373

So let‚Äôs say I just credit salary one 1st day  with draw everything on second day except 500 and withdraw the interest immediate when received before day end.. that would work right?In the sense that it doesn‚Äôt drastically increase my MAB Month on month

yeap thats what i do monthly  just that for me salary is end of month so i always take out the same day its deposited. i just top up 500 monthly on the 1st of the monthonly thing u have to be careful  1st of the month if it doesnt fall on weekday  the 500 that u deposit on the 1st wont be counted on that day  abit more complex so for those months i just top up 600 on the 1st to be conservative and sure that i get 500 monthly balance. you can calculate a more exact number but i just lazy and do 600 if 1st falls on saturday or sunday
Basically I‚Äôm trying to avoid the drastic increase of MABElse I would have to forgo 1 month of interest just to reset the MAB to the lowest possible
But it needs a few days for the system to records the salary crediting right?If you do it on the 27th‚Ä¶ will it be in time for 30th or 31st?
nope  salary crediting always will be accounted  even if its last day of the month
Even if you withdraw it 1 min after depositing ?Do they just look at the statement and check that a salary deposit was received?

yeap. correct. they have an automated way of checking if salary is deposited  dont need to keep minimum minutes or days  i usually take out within 1 hour of receiving sms that my salary deposited  sometimes even immediately if im free at that point of time
Oh cool so it‚Äôs different from credit card where we have to wait for the pending status to end
